name: Falling Blocks (itch) (Muthu.Gamedev)
description:
Hi friends 😇 . In this game, different colours blocks will fall you have to select the colour of the block  which is falling .you can select the colour by clicking the below colurs and then fire the same colour against falling block using the up arrow icon..

KEY POINTS:-

* IF SAME COLOUR BLOCKS COLLOIDES. IT DISAPPEAR AND YOU WILL GET A POINT.

* YOU HAVE TO FIRE THE CORRECT COLOUR OF THE BLOCK UNTILL IT REACH THE BOTTOM 

OTHERWISE ,YOU WILL LOSE YOUR POINT

I HOPE YOU WILL ENJOY THIS GAME 😇.. AND SHARE UR VALUABLE FEEDBACK .. THIS WILL HELP ME TO IMPROVE
